It belongs to the family Caryophyllaceae and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers and succulent leaves. Neumayera is a rare and resilient species, with its unique morphology allowing it to conserve moisture and withstand freezing temperatures. Its presence in such a hostile environment highlights its evolutionary adaptations to extreme botanical challenges.
